mean_cn: n. 化学制品；  adj. 化学的
mean_en: a substance (such as an element or compound) that is made by a chemical process
word_etyma: chem化学 + ical ...的 → a.化学的 n.化学制品
deformation_desc: 烧瓶的形状就像是个大写的A。
sentence: Watch out--if you mix those chemicals together they will explode!
sentence_trans: 小心！如果你把这些化学制品混合在一起会爆炸的！
